rules.name: Python Line Length
rules.description: Enforce 100 character line length limit for Python files
rules.message: Line exceeds 100 characters. Consider refactoring for better readability.

rules.name: Shell Indentation
rules.description: Use 4 spaces for indentation in shell scripts
rules.message: Use 4 spaces for indentation instead of tabs in shell scripts.

rules.name: Shell Line Length
rules.description: Enforce 100 character line length limit for shell scripts
rules.message: Line exceeds 100 characters. Consider refactoring for better readability.

rules.name: Shell Trailing Whitespace
rules.description: Remove trailing whitespace in shell scripts

rules.name: Shell Double Quote Strings
rules.description: Use single quotes for strings without variables in shell scripts
rules.message: Use single quotes for strings without variables.

rules.name: Shell Shebang
rules.description: Ensure shell scripts have a proper shebang
rules.message: Shell scripts should start with a shebang (#!/bin/bash).

rules.name: Shell End of File
rules.description: Ensure shell scripts end with a newline
rules.message: Files should end with a newline.
